name: World of pain
description:
Nobody wanted to do this... Killing shadows is a dirty work, but the worst is that if you become a hunter you can't get back from the night dimension... Or can?

Kill shadows, avoid traps, collect money, find new guns and trade with other hunters who would await for you in dungeon... If it's dungeon at all...

Here  you  have to use any methods to go forward: door by door, room by room, level by level... Amout of shadows is so big that you just can't kill them face-to-face, so you need to hide, to shoot from the corner, to make them follow you - you need to do anything to get to the next level... Because it's the only chanse...

Controlls:
Press WASD to move, space to pick up/use item, enter to buy, left mouse button to shot
